pages.text: $(italic)The zombies you encounter every day wear lots of valuable equipment. But when they die, it disappears never to be seen again.$(br2)No problem if you manage to snatch it from them while they are still alive. Gotcha!
$(br3)Small chance for mobs (and other players!) to drop their equipment when hit.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.
